tool.name: assemblystats

param.label: Type of read
param.name: type
param.help: Is this from an genomic (contig) or transcriptomic assembly (isotig) or are these raw reads (read)
param.option: Raw reads from sequencer in FASTA format (useful for 454 data)

param.name: bucket
param.label: Output histogram with bin sizes=1
param.help: Use this to specify whether or not bin sizes of 1 should be used when plotting histograms

param.name: all_outputs
param.label: Return all output files
param.help: If checked, all output files will be displayed. If not checked, only the file 'Assembly Statistics' will be provided.

data.name: summedcontigdata
data.label: Cumulative sum of contig size data - $input.display_name

tool.help:
**Summarise assembly overview**
This script is used to give summary statistics of an assembly or set of reads. Typically this is run after an assembly to evaluate gross features.
# Gives back # - N50 # - num of contigs > 1 kb # - num of contigs # - Read or Contig Histogram and graphs. # - Summed contig length (by number of contigs, in sorted order)
